imports:
import InputField from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/InputField";
import Stack from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/Stack";
example:
() => (
  <Stack direction="column">
    <InputField
      label="Email"
      placeholder="jose@example.com"
      type="email"
      inputMode="email"
    />
    <InputField
      label="Email"
      placeholder="jose@example.com"
      type="email"
      inputMode="email"
      size="small"
    />
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Sizes
info.description: Input fields can be either normal sized or small.
